title: The Shadow Knight and the Lost Grove
description: A Shadow Knight has stolen the Heart of the Grove! Can three heroes save the magical forest before it fades away forever?

preview.tagline: Save the magical forest from the Shadow Knight's dark curse!

ageRating.reason: Fantasy adventure with a shadowy villain and magical forest setting

prologue.worldIntro: Deep in the heart of the kingdom lies the Ancient Grove - a magical forest where the trees sing and tiny spirits dance among the flowers. But something is wrong. A Shadow Knight has stolen the Heart of the Grove - the glowing crystal that keeps the forest alive. Without it, the leaves are turning gray. The flowers are wilting. The forest spirits are hiding.

characterIntros.introText: Flame Striker has fists of fire! When danger comes, those flames burn bright and strong.
Sparkle Rider befriends magical creatures! Her kindness and sparkle win hearts everywhere she goes.
Shadow Ranger can walk unseen through any forest! The best tracker in all the land.

prologue.missionBrief: The entrance to the Ancient Grove stands before you. Somewhere deep inside, the Shadow Knight waits with the stolen Heart of the Grove. Find him, defeat him, and save the forest!

characters.name: Flame Striker
characters.description: A brave hero with fists of fire, wearing an adventurer outfit with ORANGE accents

characters.name: Sparkle Rider
characters.description: A kind hero who befriends magical creatures, wearing a PINK dress with SPARKLES

characters.name: Shadow Ranger
characters.description: A stealthy hero who can walk unseen, wearing a forest ranger outfit with DARK GREEN hood and cloak

scenes.title: The Forest Entrance
scenes.narrationText:
You stand at the edge of the Ancient Grove. The trees here are still green, but you can see the gray creeping in deeper ahead.

A tiny forest spirit peeks out from behind a mushroom. It looks scared - but when it sees you, it chirps hopefully.

'Heroes! You came!' it squeaks. 'The Shadow Knight went THAT way. But the path is tricky. You'll need to prove you're brave enough to enter!'

characterTurns.promptText: The spirit points to a pile of wet leaves blocking the path. 'Can you light the way?'

choices.label: Make a torch to guide everyone

successOutcome.text: Flames burst from those fists - WHOOSH! The leaves burn away and the path is clear! The spirit cheers.

failOutcome.text: The flames sputter in the damp air - but with extra concentration, the fire grows stronger and slowly burns through!

characterTurns.promptText: The spirit looks at a tangle of thorny vines. 'These only open for something beautiful. Can you show them some sparkle?'

successOutcome.text: A beautiful twirl sends sparkles everywhere! The vines shiver... then curl back like they're dancing! A path opens up.

failOutcome.text: The vines only wiggle a little at first. But with the biggest smile and another twirl, they slowly curl away.

characterTurns.promptText: Through the trees, there's a faint misty path - almost invisible. The spirit gasps. 'You can SEE that? Only the best rangers can find the Misty Way...'

successOutcome.text: Those ranger eyes lock onto the path. 'I'll take the Misty Way and find something to help us.' The spirit nods with wide eyes. 'The Grove Blade is hidden there...'

failOutcome.text: The mist swirls and the path disappears for a moment - but a deep breath and focus brings it back. 'I'm going.' The spirit nods. 'Good luck, ranger.'

outcome.resultText:
Shadow Ranger pulls up that hood and steps into the mist. In seconds - vanished like a shadow.

The spirit tugs at the others. 'This way! I'll take you the sunny path. My friends will help you!'

The heroes split up. But they'll meet again soon.

scenes.title: The Misty Woods
scenes.narrationText:
Shadow Ranger moves alone through the Misty Woods. The fog is thick. The trees look the same in every direction. Most people would be lost instantly.

But not a Shadow Ranger.

Moving like a ghost, watching for signs - a broken twig here, a mossy stone there. And then... a stone shrine, covered in vines. Inside, something glows faintly. A sword, waiting for a worthy hero.

But the shrine has a guardian. A stone wolf, eyes glowing, blocking the way.

characterTurns.promptText: The stone wolf growls, but it doesn't attack. It's testing you. Do you have the courage to approach?

successOutcome.text: Standing tall and walking forward without hesitation. The stone wolf watches... then bows its head and steps aside. The GROVE BLADE is claimed! It hums with ancient power.

failOutcome.text: The wolf growls louder at first. But kneeling down slowly shows no harm is meant. The wolf sniffs the air... and steps aside. The GROVE BLADE is carefully claimed.

outcome.resultText: The Grove Blade glows with forest magic. Time to find the others and face the Shadow Knight!

scenes.title: The Sunny Grove
scenes.narrationText:
Flame Striker and Sparkle Rider follow the little spirit into a beautiful sunny clearing. The light sparkles through the leaves. Tiny spirits peek out everywhere - from flowers, from mushrooms, from hollow logs.

'Welcome, heroes!' they chirp. 'Welcome to the heart of the happy forest!'

But then - near a fallen log, caught in a tangle of shadowy thorns... a UNICORN. Its white coat is dirty. Its horn flickers weakly. It's trapped.

'The Shadow Knight's magic,' a spirit whispers sadly. 'We couldn't free her.'

characterTurns.promptText: The thorns are dark and twisted. Maybe fire can burn them away?

successOutcome.text: FLAMES blast from those fists and the thorns HISS and shrink back from the heat! The unicorn lifts its head hopefully.

failOutcome.text: The thorns resist the flames at first, but persistent fire makes them wilt and loosen. Progress!

characterTurns.promptText: The unicorn looks so scared. Can you show her you're friendly?

successOutcome.text: Walking up slowly, sparkling softly, hand held out. The unicorn's eyes meet those kind eyes. It trusts this hero. A new friendship is born!

failOutcome.text: A little nervous at first - but keeping calm and walking closer. The unicorn relaxes. Friends now!

outcome.resultText:
The last thorns fall away. The unicorn stands up, shaky but free. She walks straight over and nuzzles gently.

'She likes you!' the spirits cheer. 'She wants you to be her rider!'

A unicorn companion joins the team!

scenes.title: The Shadow Barrier
scenes.narrationText:
Deeper into the forest. The mist is darker here. The trees look twisted and wrong.

And then - a wall of pure shadow, blocking the path forward. Dark magic swirls and crackles. No ordinary weapon could cut through this.

But the Grove Blade isn't ordinary.

Holding up the sword, it glows brighter, pushing back the darkness. Time to strike true and break through!

characterTurns.promptText: The shadow wall pulses like it's alive. Find the weak point and strike with all your courage!

successOutcome.text: There! A crack in the darkness, just for a second. A LUNGE forward and a slash with the Grove Blade. The wall SHATTERS into wisps of smoke!

failOutcome.text: The first swing misses as the shadows shift. But watching the pattern and trying again finds the rhythm - the wall crumbles!

outcome.resultText:
Beyond the barrier - a clearing. And in that clearing... a dark figure waits. The Shadow Knight.

But familiar voices and hoofbeats approach from behind...

scenes.title: The Hidden Glade
scenes.narrationText:
The unicorn leads the way through a secret path - between two waterfalls, under a rainbow arch, into a hidden glade that sparkles with golden light.

'Ooooh!' the forest spirits gasp. 'The old place! We forgot about the old place!'

In the center of the glade, buried under soft moss and glowing flowers, is an ancient treasure chest. It's covered in symbols of flame.

'This was left here long ago,' a spirit whispers. 'For a Flame Striker. We could never open it.'

characterTurns.promptText: The chest has a lock shaped like a flame. It needs YOUR fire to open. Put your hand on the lock!

choices.label: Focus all your heat into it

successOutcome.text: A palm pressed against the lock, concentrating hard. The hand glows warm, then HOT - CLICK! The chest opens with golden light. Inside: the FLAME GAUNTLETS!

failOutcome.text: The lock doesn't budge at first. But thinking about being brave sends warmth spreading - the lock clicks open. The FLAME GAUNTLETS are claimed!

characterTurns.promptText: The unicorn kneels down. She wants you to climb on her back!

successOutcome.text: Climbing onto the unicorn's back like it's been done a hundred times! Holding the sparkly mane tight. The unicorn stands tall, ready for battle!

failOutcome.text: A little slip at first, but the unicorn is patient. Trying again with a good grip on the soft mane - steady now. A true team!

outcome.resultText:
The Flame Gauntlets go on - fists ERUPT with fire! But it doesn't hurt. It feels like power.

Sitting tall on the unicorn, ready to charge.

'The Shadow Knight is close!' a spirit calls. 'Your friend needs you! GO!'

Racing through the forest to where Shadow Ranger waits, Grove Blade in hand.

The three heroes are together again. And the Shadow Knight stands before them.

scenes.title: The Shadow Knight
scenes.narrationText:
The Shadow Knight towers before you. His armor is dark as midnight. In his chest, trapped in a cage of shadow, the Heart of the Grove flickers weakly.

'So,' the Knight's voice echoes. 'Three little heroes think they can defeat me?'

Grove Blade ready. Flame Gauntlets burning bright. Unicorn stamping and snorting.

'We don't THINK,' Shadow Ranger says. 'We KNOW.'

The Shadow Knight raises his sword.

'THEN COME AND PROVE IT!'

characterTurns.promptText: Strike first with those Flame Gauntlets!

outcome.text: CHARGING forward! The Flame Gauntlets blaze with fire as a massive punch hits the Shadow Knight's shield - BOOM! The knight staggers back!
The unicorn RACES forward! Its horn glows with sparkly magic as they slam into the Shadow Knight - CRASH! He drops to one knee!

characterTurns.promptText: Land the final blow with the Grove Blade!

outcome.text: Leaping into the air, Grove Blade shining like a star - bringing it down with all that strength! The Shadow Knight's armor CRACKS and SHATTERS!

outcome.resultText:
The darkness explodes outward - then fades away like smoke in sunlight.

Where the Shadow Knight stood... just an empty suit of armor. And floating above it, finally free: the HEART OF THE GROVE.

It drifts down gently into the center of the clearing and pulses with warm, golden light.

You did it. All three of you. TOGETHER.

ending.title: The Grove Restored
ending.narrationText:
The moment the Heart returns to the forest, everything changes.

The gray leaves burst into green. Flowers bloom in every color. The twisted trees straighten and stretch toward the sun. Tiny spirits pour out of hiding, dancing and cheering.

'HEROES! HEROES! HEROES!'

The unicorn nuzzles proudly. The spirits swarm around, admiring the gauntlets. And the biggest spirit of all - an old one with a long mossy beard - approaches.

'Flame Striker. Sparkle Rider. Shadow Ranger. You saved us all. These gifts are yours to keep - forever.'

The three heroes stand together in the restored grove as the sun sets through the golden leaves.

The forest is safe. The Heart is home. And somewhere out there... another adventure is waiting.

characterRewards.description: Magical gauntlets that make fists burn with fire. Whenever power is needed, they'll burn bright.
A magical unicorn friend. Whenever she's needed, just sparkle - and she'll come.
An ancient sword that glows with forest magic. A weapon for a true hero.
